thread.title: Former UFC champ Carla Esparza meets Maryna Moroz in Oklahoma City
thread.title_full: Former UFC champ Carla Esparza meets Maryna Moroz in Oklahoma City

title: Former UFC champ Carla Esparza meets Maryna Moroz in Oklahoma City
text:
Mar 24, 2017 at 1:08p ET 0Shares 
Former UFC champion Carla Esparza will make her return to action on June 25 when she faces Maryna Moroz as part of the upcoming card in Oklahoma City. 
Sources close to the matchup confirmed the news to FOX Sports on Friday following an initial report from ESPN. 
Esparza (11-4) will look to bounce back from a very close, controversial decision to Randa Markos in February when she returns to the cage this summer. 
The former women‚Äôs strawweight champion has suffered through injuries and a lot of time off since her loss to current title holder Joanna Jedrzejczyk, but now Esparza will try to climb back to the top of the rankings when she returns in June. UFC Fight Night 112 June 25th Oklahoma City üëäüèΩ @teamoyama
